title: Ticket #132: Fix gittrac style sheet for Internet Explorer
description:
The gittrac Condor cusomized style sheet and header look like crap on Internet Explorer. The menu items on the header of the page are all messed up. Be real nice to fix this.

The style sheet and header customizations look fine on Firefox and Safari; dunno about Chrome, but prolly fine since Safari and Chrome both use WebKit.
remarks:
2009-Feb-18 13:52:19 by tannenba:
Tristan put about 30 minutes into it, no luck.

2009-Feb-25 12:11:11 by tannenba:
Ok, now the page looks OK in IE, but CR/LFs do not display in the edit boxes!!! How this is even possible to mess up I have no idea.

2009-Mar-05 14:01:28 by tannenba:
So the problem with CR/LF not working in edit boxes on IE seems to be related to upstream commits documented here. Upstream they know they still have problems to work out here.

For the time being, I made a quick hack in our version of the code to work around the problem.

Since things now seem to work decently enough on IE, I am closing this ticket. We are one step closer to making this site public in time for Condor Week 2009! whoot.
creator: tannenba
